SEARCH
Package src.repository

Interface ProjectRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectCsvMapper
public interface ProjectRepository
Repository interface for managing Project data from a data source. Encapsulates data access operations such as loading, saving, updating, and deleting project records.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteProjectByName(String name)
    Deletes a project from the data source by matching its name.
    List<Project>
    loadAll()
    Loads all project entries from the data source.
    void
    save(Project project)
    Appends a new project to the data source.
    void
    saveAll(List<Project> projects)
    Persists a list of projects, replacing existing records.
    void
    updateProject(Project updated)
    Updates an existing project record in the data source.

  • Method Details

    • loadAll

      List<Project> loadAll()
      Loads all project entries from the data source.
      Returns:
      List of all Project objects.

    • saveAll

      void saveAll(List<Project> projects)
      Persists a list of projects, replacing existing records.
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of Project objects to be saved.

    • save

      void save(Project project)
      Appends a new project to the data source.
      Parameters:
      project - The Project object to be added.

    • updateProject

      void updateProject(Project updated)
      Updates an existing project record in the data source.
      Parameters:
      updated - The Project object containing updated values.

    • deleteProjectByName

      void deleteProjectByName(String name)
      Deletes a project from the data source by matching its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the project to delete.
